format: A data frame with 22 observations on the following 5 variables.

parameters.sex: a factor with levels female and male.
parameters.treatment: a factor with levels placebo and active.
parameters.number3m: the number of polyps after three month.

reference:
The data arise from the same study as the polyps data. Here, 
the number of polyps after three months are given.
description:
Description
Data from a placebo-controlled trial of a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory
drug in the treatment of familial andenomatous polyposis (FAP).
title: Familial Andenomatous Polyposis
